subject: Re: how to decode it?
body:
In my browser, that shows up as Chinese/Japanese characters
On 5/10/07, Jen mlists  wrote:> I saw this string in our web logfile. I don't know what it is.Maybe it> was encoded with utf8?> Please help show a way to decode it.Thanks!> The string is,> \u0368\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\u03f4\ufffd\ufffd\u04ff\u06b6\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd>
